jslib.hideRecordButton: function(pageContext) { var recordBtnHide = 'true'; if (pageContext.subContext) { if (typeof pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType !== 'undefined' && pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType !== '' && Array.isArray(pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType) === true && pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType[0].listOptionAnswerId === 'assetServicing') { recordBtnHide = 'false'; } else { recordBtnHide = 'true'; } } return recordBtnHide; }
jslib.hideServicedEquipmentFileUrl: function(pageContext) { var servicedEquipmentFileUrl = 'true'; if (pageContext.subContext) { if (typeof pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType === 'undefined' || pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType == '') { servicedEquipmentFileUrl = 'true'; return servicedEquipmentFileUrl; } if (typeof pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType !== 'undefined' && pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType !== '' && typeof pageContext.subContext.selectedAssetToService !== 'undefined' && pageContext.subContext.selectedAssetToService !== '' && pageContext.subContext.selectedAssetToService.length > 0 && typeof pageContext.subContext.selectedAssetToService[0].fileUrl !== 'undefined' && pageContext.subContext.selectedAssetToService[0].fileUrl !== '') { servicedEquipmentFileUrl = 'false'; } else { servicedEquipmentFileUrl = 'true'; } } return servicedEquipmentFileUrl; }
jslib.hideRemovedEquipment: function(pageContext) {  var removedEquipmentShow = 'true'; if (pageContext.subContext) {  if (typeof pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType !== 'undefined' && pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType !== '' && Array.isArray(pageContext.subContext.selectedService) === true && ( pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType[0].listOptionAnswerId === 'assetReplacement' || pageContext.subContext.selectedServiceType[0].listOptionAnswerId === 'assetRemoval')) { removedEquipmentShow = 'false'; } else { removedEquipmentShow = 'true'; } } return removedEquipmentShow; }

jslib.formattedTime: function(pageContext){function formatDate(date) { if (date) { var d = date, month = '' + (d.getMonth() + 1), day = '' + d.getDate(), year = d.getFullYear(); var hours = d.getHours().toString(); var minutes = d.getMinutes().toString(); var seconds = d.getSeconds().toString(); var timeZone = new Date().toString().split(' ')[5]; if (minutes.length < 2) minutes = '0' + minutes; if (hours.length < 2) hours = '0' + hours; if (seconds.length < 2) seconds = '0' + seconds; time = hours + ':' + minutes + ':' + seconds; if (month.length < 2) month = '0' + month; if (day.length < 2) day = '0' + day; return ([year, month, day].join('-') + ' ' + time + ' (' + timeZone + ')'); } else { return '-'; } } return formatDate(new Date());}
